name: poison-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.
